item.title: ðŸŽ“ Tips on maximizing your IB credits at UBC (and deciding which IB courses to take)
item.description: So you’re taking some IB courses? Don’t throw all your hard work away if you’re going to UBC! Or maybe you’re deciding if you should take IB. Getting course credit for taking IB classes can save you a lot of time and money. I’ll now tell you how I used my IB credits and mistakes I’ve made in choosing my courses as a first year student.
